description: For React components with accessibility, responsiveness, and performance requirements
usage: Copy this template and customize for UI component stories

template.name: Feature Name: UI Components
acceptance_criteria: File src/components/domain/[domain]/[component].tsx exists and [describe core rendering]
File src/components/domain/[domain]/[component].tsx [describe additional components if needed]
[Describe component props interface and required props]
[Describe core interaction: click, select, input, etc.]
[Describe visual states: loading, empty, error]
[Describe integration: where/how component is used in parent]
[RESPONSIVE] Component adapts to mobile/tablet/desktop breakpoints
[LOADING] Shows skeleton/loading states during data fetch
[EMPTY] Shows appropriate empty state when no data
[ERROR] Shows error state with retry option when applicable
[KEYBOARD] All interactions accessible via keyboard navigation
[A11Y] Proper ARIA labels, roles, and screen reader support
[PERFORMANCE] Component loads in < 200ms [or appropriate metric]
npm run typecheck passes

enhancements.component_type: Specify: Form, List, Detail, Wizard, etc.

customization_guide.id: Use 'c' suffix for UI component stories (after server functions 'b')
acceptance_criteria: Always include file existence checks with specific paths
Specify component props and core functionality
Include all required UI states: RESPONSIVE, LOADING, EMPTY, ERROR
Include accessibility requirements: KEYBOARD, A11Y
Include performance requirements with measurable metrics
End with typecheck verification
enhancements: Move detailed UI specs here, not in main criteria
Reference wireframe files for complex interactions
Include component type for pattern matching
customization_guide.dependencies: Usually depends on server functions for data

examples.name: Customer Tags: UI Components
acceptance_criteria: File src/components/domain/customers/tag-badge.tsx renders colored tag badge
File src/components/domain/customers/tag-selector.tsx provides multi-select combobox for tags
File src/components/domain/customers/tag-manager-dialog.tsx provides CRUD UI in settings
Customer detail page (src/routes/_authed/customers/$customerId.tsx) shows tags below customer name
Tag selector on customer detail allows assign/remove
Customer list (src/components/domain/customers/customer-columns.tsx) shows tags as badges column
Filter by tag added to customer list filters
Settings page has 'Manage Tags' option linking to tag-manager-dialog
RESPONSIVE: Mobile (< 640px) shows max 2 tags with '+N more' overflow badge
RESPONSIVE: Tablet (640-1024px) shows max 4 tags inline
RESPONSIVE: Desktop (> 1024px) shows all tags with horizontal scroll on overflow
LOADING: Tag selector shows skeleton loader while fetching tags
LOADING: Tag badges show pulse animation during assignment operations
EMPTY STATE: 'No tags yet' with 'Add your first tag' CTA button in tag selector
ERROR: Error boundary wraps tag components with retry action
KEYBOARD: Tab navigates between tags, Enter/Space toggles selection
KEYBOARD: Escape closes tag selector dropdown
A11Y: Tag badges have role='status' and aria-label describing tag name and color
A11Y: Tag selector has aria-expanded, aria-haspopup='listbox' attributes
A11Y: Remove tag button has aria-label='Remove tag: {tagName}'
npm run typecheck passes
